EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Follow up to today's call (1563472404.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Follow up to today's call (1563472404.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Tracy,
I hope all is well and thank you so much for your time on the phone with me. Thank you for confirming that everything is being delivered to one spot within the office. I have conveyed that the building itself is a stair carry and therefore your location on the second floor is the main point of delivery. Please let me know if there is anything I can do to support you as well as ensure that everything goes smoothly. Thank you again and have a good day.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
